thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 04 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Westpac Bank to raise $593.3 mln through notes offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Westpac Bank to raise $593.3 mln through notes offering
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Australia’s Westpac Banking Corp intends raising about A$750 million ($593.33 million) through an offering of capital notes, it said on Monday.
Each note will have an issue price of A$100, and the distribution margin on the notes is expected to be between 3.20 percent and 3.40 percent per annum, the bank said in a statement.
The bank also said that the notes will be Quote: d on the Australian stock exchange, and they will qualify as Additional Tier 1 Capital under the Australian Prudential Regulation Authority’s capital adequacy framework ($1 = 1.2641 Australian dollars) (Reporting by Ambar Warrick in Bengaluru; Editing by Susan Thomas)
